name: Broke N Broker
description:
Game for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam. 

The theme for the jam was "Out of Control".

While our game doesn't do it on the fly like we wanted, we still use real stocks data in order to generate our game. From what we know, there is nothing more out of control and chaotic as a day on the stock market.

Select the stocks you want to invest in, and go through three levels of trying to make your way up wall street.

The idea is that it's like a rhythm game, where you want to catch green stocks to make more money, and catch red stocks to keep your hard earned cash. 

See the instructions on the side of the screen.

We highly recommend that you use the full screen toggle in order to play the game as intended.

Team of:

Guy Ravid,

Shai Lev

Noa Kaplan-Lev
